name: Paragon - Sample App
description: A demo Next.js app, with integrations built on Paragon

NEXT_PUBLIC_PARAGON_PROJECT_ID.description: Your Paragon Project ID, which can be found in the Paragon dashboard in any integration.

PARAGON_SIGNING_KEY.description: Your Paragon Signing Key, which can be created in the Settings tab of the Paragon dashboard.
